name: Ripped (ArkhenRei, thoculus)
description:
You are a tailor who repairs people's clothes in your cozy, little store. But of course, life isn't easy like that. You need to make the finest repairs and earn money to continue tailoring. 

We wanted to add some features but we made this game in 3 - 4 days. So, we couldn't add them. We will update this game and add those features, fix bugs etc.  in the coming weeks.

How to play:

Drag/Drop/Click with Mouse

Run the sewing machine with Space

Tips and Tricks:

  • Before sewing you need to drag the fabric to the sewing machine and most importantly iron the dress first and pick the right needle for the matching dress or your sewing quality is going to be evaluated on average.
  • While sewing you need to pay attention to the needle's point. It needs to be on the stitch line.
